name: Chop Chop Hockey
description:
"An awesome arcade experience"- Gamezebo,
"Bodyslams onto the ice"- Pocket Gamer

Chop Chop Hockey is a frantic 3v3 hockey game! There’s no referee, only bone-crushing hits
and constant action: Skate, hit, pass and score!

Play as one of the 8 original teams and enhance your experience with the Ultimate Pack
available in the Chop Chop Shop. 3 new teams, 3 new arenas, 3 new tournaments!

Are you fast enough?

Features:
*Fast paced 3v3 games
*Intuitive gameplay
*Easy to play
*Colorful & cartoonish graphics
*Lots of teams/arenas
*Full Retina Display!

Join the community on Facebook: www.facebook.com/gamerizon
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/gamerizon

Chop Chop Hockey™ is a trademark from Gamerizon Studios Inc.
